SdS.title: SdS Game System
SdS.AbilityUseHint: Configure how you would like to use the {name} {type}.
SdS.AbilityUseUnavailableHint: There are no uses of this item remaining!
SdS.AbilityUseChargedHint: This {type} is charged and ready to use!
SdS.AbilityUseRechargeHint: This {type} is depleted and must be recharged!
SdS.AbilityUseNormalHint: This {type} has {value} of {max} uses per {per} remaining.
SdS.AbilityUseConsumableChargeHint: Using this {type} will consume 1 charge of {value} remaining.
SdS.AbilityUseConsumableQuantityHint: Using this {type} will consume 1 quantity of {quantity} remaining
SdS.AbilityUseConsumableDestroyHint: Using this {type} will consume its final charge and it will be destroyed.
SdS.AbilityConfigure: Configure Ability Checks and Saving Throws
SdS.AbilityConfigurationHint: Configure ability saving throw proficiency, saving throw bonuses, and check bonuses.
SdS.AbilityCheckGlobalBonusHint: This bonus applies to all ability checks made by this actor.
SdS.ActionWarningNoItem: The requested item {item} no longer exists on Actor {name}
SdS.ActionWarningNoToken: You must have one or more controlled Tokens in order to use this option.
SdS.ActorWarningInvalidItem: {itemType} items cannot be added to a {actorType}.
SdS.ActiveEffectOverrideWarning: This value is being modified by an Active Effect and cannot be edited. Disable the effect to edit it.
SdS.AddEmbeddedItemPromptHint: Do you want to add these items to your character sheet?
SdS.AdvancementDeleteConfirmationMessage: Deleting this item will also delete all advancement choices made for it. These changes will be removed from your character as long as the checkbox below is checked.
SdS.AdvancementHitPointsHint: Track the player's hit points for each level in the class.
SdS.AdvancementHitPointsEmptyError: Hit points must be rolled or the average value must be taken.
SdS.AdvancementHitPointsInvalidError: Hit points must be a valid whole number.
SdS.AdvancementManaPointsHint: Track the player's mana points for each level in the class.
SdS.AdvancementManaPoints: The base mana for your level is {mana}. Your multiplier is {mana_percentage}. You'll have {total_mana} MP.
SdS.AdvancementItemGrantHint: Grant the character items (such as equipment, features, or spells) when they reach a certain level.
SdS.AdvancementItemGrantDropHint: Drop Items here to add them to the list granted by this advancement.
SdS.AdvancementItemGrantDuplicateWarning: That item already exists on this advancement.
SdS.AdvancementItemGrantRecursiveWarning: You cannot grant an item in its own advancement.
SdS.AdvancementItemGrantOptionalHint: If optional, players will be given the option to opt out of any of the following items, otherwise all of them are granted.
SdS.AdvancementItemTypeInvalidWarning: {type} items cannot be added with this advancement type.
SdS.AdvancementLevelDownConfirmationMess: Leveling this class down will also undo all advancement choices made for it. These changes will be removed from your character as long as the checkbox below is checked.
SdS.AdvancementManagerCloseMessage: If the advancement process is cancelled, choices made so far will be discarded and no changes will be made to the actor.
SdS.AdvancementManagerRestartConfirm: Are you sure you wish to undo all choices so far?
SdS.AdvancementMigrationHint: Select which of the following advancements will be added to {name}.
SdS.AdvancementScaleValueHint: A single value that changes as a class increases in level that is made available in roll formulas (such as a Monk's martial arts die).
SdS.AdvancementScaleValueIdentifierHint: This scale value for the current level will be available using @scale.{class}.{identifier} in a formula.
SdS.AdvancementScaleValueTypeHintCR: Use this for representing creature challenge ratings for features like Wild Shape.
SdS.AdvancementScaleValueTypeHintDice: Use this for dice values like bardic inspiration, sneak attack, or superiority dice.
SdS.AdvancementScaleValueTypeHintDistanc: Use this for numerical values that represent a distance, such as unarmored movement speed, or aura of protection radius.
SdS.AdvancementScaleValueTypeHintNumber: Use this for purely numerical values like rage damage bonus or number of uses per day.
SdS.AdvancementScaleValueTypeHintString: Use this if you are unsure of the type of the scale values, or if the type does not matter.
SdS.ArmorConfigHint: Fill in the above box to override automatically calculated armor class.
SdS.BonusesHint: Define global bonuses as formulas which are added to certain rolls. For example: 1d4 + 2
SdS.BonusesInstructions: Configure character bonuses which are added to the appropriate dice roll
SdS.ClassIdentifierHint: This class's data will be accessible using @classes.{identifier} in roll formulas.
SdS.ClassMakeOriginalHint: First class taken by character used to determine certain class traits when multiclassing.
SdS.ConsumeWarningNoResource: {name} is designated to consume {type} but no resource is specified!
SdS.ConsumeWarningNoSource: The designated {type} source that {name} consumes no longer exists!
SdS.ConsumeWarningNoQuantity: {name} has run out of its designated {type}!
SdS.ConsumeWarningZeroAttribute: {name} has run out of its designated attribute resource pool!
SdS.ConsumableLastChargeWarn: This is the last charge of this unit and consuming it will also reduce the item's quantity by 1
SdS.CurrencyConvertHint: Convert all carried currency to the highest possible denomination to reduce the amount of coinage carried by the character. Be wary, this action cannot be undone.
SdS.DamagePhysicalBypassHint: These weapon properties will bypass damage resistance for physical damage.
SdS.DeathSaveCriticalSuccess: {name} critically succeeded on a death saving throw and has regained 1 Hit Point!
SdS.DeathSaveSuccess: {name} has survived with 3 death save successes and is now stable!
SdS.DeathSaveFailure: {name} has died with 3 death save failures!
SdS.DeathSaveUnnecessary: You do not need to roll death saves because you have a positive number of hit points or have already reached 3 successes or failures.
SdS.EffectUnavailableInfo: Source item must be equipped or attuned to activate these
SdS.FilterNoSpells: No spells found for this set of filters.
SdS.NoSpellLevels: This character has no spellcaster levels, but you may add spells manually.
SdS.FlagsInstructions: Configure character features and traits which fine-tune behaviors of the SdS system.
SdS.FlagsDiamondSoulHint: Gain proficiency to all saving throws.
SdS.FlagsElvenAccuracyHint: Roll an extra d20 with advantage to Dex, Int, Wis, or Cha.
SdS.FlagsHalflingLuckyHint: Reroll ones when rolling d20 checks.
SdS.FlagsInitiativeAdvHint: Provided by feats or magical items.
SdS.FlagsJOATHint: Half-Proficiency to Ability Checks in which you are not already Proficient.
SdS.FlagsObservantHint: Provides a +5 to passive Perception and Investigation.
SdS.FlagsRemarkableAthleteHint: Half-Proficiency (rounded-up) to physical Ability Checks and Initiative.
SdS.FlagsWeaponCritThresholdHint: An expanded critical hit threshold for weapon attacks.
SdS.FlagsSpellCritThresholdHint: An expanded critical hit threshold for spell attacks.
SdS.FlagsMeleeCriticalDiceHint: A number of additional damage dice added to melee weapon critical hits.
SdS.FormulaMissingReferenceWarn: The {property} formula within {name} has references to missing data: {references}
SdS.HPFormulaError: The provided hit point formula could not be evaluated.
SdS.HitDiceConfigHint: Adjust remaining hit dice levels for each class.
SdS.HitDiceWarn: {name} has no available {formula} Hit Dice remaining!
SdS.IdentifierError: Identifier can only contain letters (a-z), numbers (0-9), dashes (-), and underscores (_).
SdS.InitiativeConfigHint: Configure initiative modifiers and bonuses which apply to this Actor.
SdS.ItemRecoveryFormulaWarning: Unable to recover charges for {name}. Invalid recovery formula '{formula}'.
SdS.LongRestHint: Take a long rest? On a long rest you will recover hit points, half your maximum hit dice, class resources, limited use item charges, and spell slots.
SdS.LongRestResult: {name} takes a long rest and recovers {health} Hit Points and {dice} Hit Dice.
SdS.LongRestResultHitDice: {name} takes a long rest and recovers {dice} Hit Dice.
SdS.LongRestResultHitPoints: {name} takes a long rest and recovers {health} Hit Points.
SdS.MaxCharacterLevelExceededWarn: Character cannot be advanced past level {max}.
SdS.MaxClassLevelExceededWarn: Class cannot be advanced past level {max}.
SdS.MaxClassLevelMinimumWarn: Class must have at least one level.
SdS.ModuleArtConfigH: Configure which module-provided art should be used.
SdS.Name: Character Name
SdS.PolymorphKeepAE: Keep all effects (overrides other effect retention options).
SdS.PolymorphKeepBackgroundAE: Keep effects that originate from your background?
SdS.PolymorphKeepClass: Keep proficiency bonus (leaves class items in sheet)
SdS.PolymorphKeepClassAE: Keep effects that originate from your class or subclass?
SdS.PolymorphKeepEquipmentAE: Keep effects that originate from your equipment?
SdS.PolymorphKeepFeatureAE: Keep effects that originate from your features?
SdS.PolymorphKeepMental: Keep mental ability scores (Int, Wis, Cha)
SdS.PolymorphKeepOriginAE: Keep effects that originate from this actor (i.e. effects not attached to features, items, spells)
SdS.PolymorphKeepOtherOriginAE: Keep effects that originate from a different actor?
SdS.PolymorphKeepPhysical: Keep physical ability scores (Str, Dex, Con)
SdS.PolymorphKeepSelf: Keep self (just change image and size i.e. for spells like Disguise Self)
SdS.PolymorphKeepSpellAE: Keep effects that originate from your spells?
SdS.PolymorphMergeSaves: Merge saving throw proficiencies (take the highest)
SdS.PolymorphRevertNoOriginalActorWarn: No original actor was found with reference '{reference}'
SdS.PolymorphRevertWarn: You do not have permission to revert this Actor's polymorphed state.
SdS.PolymorphWarn: You are not allowed to polymorph this actor!
SdS.MovementConfigHint: Configure movement speed and special movement attributes.
SdS.NewDayHint: Recover limited use abilities which recharge "per day"?
SdS.SaveGlobalBonusHint: This bonus applies to all saving throws made by this actor.
SdS.SensesConfigHint: Configure any special sensory perception abilities that this actor possesses.
SdS.ShortRestHint: Take a short rest? On a short rest you may spend remaining Hit Dice and recover primary or secondary resources.
SdS.ShortRestResult: {name} takes a short rest spending {dice} Hit Dice to recover {health} Hit Points.
SdS.SkillGlobalBonusCheckHint: This bonus applies to all skill checks made by this actor.
SdS.SpellCastNoSlots: You have no available {level} spell slots with which to cast {name}
SdS.SubclassIdentifierHint: This identifier should match the identifier on the parent class to ensure they are properly linked.
SdS.SubclassAssignmentError: {class} already has a subclass. Remove the existing '{subclass}' subclass before adding a new one.
SdS.SubclassDuplicateError: A subclass with the identifier {identifier} already exists on this actor.
SdS.SubclassMismatchWarn: {name} subclass has no matching class with identifier '{class}'.
SdS.VehicleActionsHint: Actions taken with full crew complement
SdS.WarnBadACFormula: The provided AC formula could not be evaluated.
SdS.WarnCantAddMultipleAdvancements: It is not currently possible to add multiple items with advancements to an actor at the same time. Please add them individually.
SdS.WarnMultipleArmor: More than one suit of armor equipped, AC calculation may be incorrect.
SdS.WarnMultipleShields: More than one shield equipped, AC calculation may be incorrect.
SdS.description: A system for playing the fifth edition of the worlds most popular roleplaying game in the Foundry Virtual Tabletop environment.
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.SdS.Class.AdditionalEqu: List of equipment granted by this class if taken at first level.
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.SdS.Class.AdditionalHit: Additional descriptive text displayed beneath the auto-generated hit points section.
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.SdS.Class.AdditionalTra: List of proficiencies granted by this class.
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.SdS.Class.DescriptionHi: Primary description of the class that will appear first.
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.SdS.Class.FeaturesDescr: As a {lowercaseName}, you gain the following class features, which are summarized in the {name} table.
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.SdS.Class.HitPointsLeve: Hit Points at 1st Level: {max} + your Constitution modifier
Hit Points at Higher Levels: {dice} (or {average}) + your Constitution modifier per {class} level after 1st
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.SdS.Class.NoValidClass: No valid class selected, press the edit button to add a class.
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.SdS.Class.OptionalFeatu: The following section contains options {class} features. These features are not granted automatically, and you can choose one, some, or all of them at your DM's discretion.
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.SdS.Class.SubclassDescr: Introduction that will be displayed before this class's subclasses.
MACRO.5eMissingTargetWarn: Your controlled actor '{actor}' does not have an {type} with name '{name}'.
MACRO.5eMultipleTargetsWarn: Your controlled actor '{actor}' has more than one {type} with name '{name}'. The first match will be chosen.
MACRO.5eNoActorSelected: No selected or assigned actor could be found to target with macro.
MACRO.5eUnownedWarn: You can only create macro buttons for owned Items
MIGRATION.5eBegin: Applying DnD5E System Migration for version {version}. Please be patient and do not close your game or shut down your server.
MIGRATION.5eComplete: DnD5E System Migration to version {version} completed!
MIGRATION.5eVersionTooOldWarning: Your SdS system data is from too old a Foundry version and cannot be reliably migrated to the latest version. The process will be attempted, but errors may occur.
SETTINGS.5eAllowPolymorphingL: Allow players to polymorph their own actors.
SETTINGS.5eAutoCollapseCardL: Automatically collapse Item Card descriptions in the Chat Log
SETTINGS.5eAutoSpellTemplateL: When a spell is cast, defaults to begin the process to create the corresponding Measured Template if any (requires TRUSTED or higher player role)
SETTINGS.5eCriticalMaxDiceL: Make critical hits more deadly by maximizing the values of base damage dice.
SETTINGS.5eCriticalModifiersL: Make critical hits more deadly by multiplying non-dice modifiers in addition to rolled dice.
SETTINGS.5eCurWtL: Carried currency affects character encumbrance following the rules on PHB pg. 143.
SETTINGS.5eDiagL: Configure which diagonal movement rule should be used for games within this system.
SETTINGS.5eHonorL: Enable the use of the optional Honor ability score. Requires the world to be reloaded.
SETTINGS.5eInitTBL: Append the raw Dexterity ability score to break ties in Initiative.
SETTINGS.5eMetricL: Replaces all reference to lbs with kgs and updates the encumbrance calculations to use metric weight units.
SETTINGS.5eNoAdvancementsL: Do not prompt for level-up or character creation choices.
SETTINGS.5eNoExpL: Remove experience bars from character sheets.
SETTINGS.5eProfL: Configure proficiency modifier to use a fixed bonus or a dice roll. Reloading the world is required for this change to take effect.
SETTINGS.5eRestL: Configure which rest variant should be used for games within this system.
SETTINGS.5eSanityL: Enable the use of the optional Sanity ability score. Requires the world to be reloaded.
